eu.focusnet.app.ui.common

Class UiHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.focusnet.app.ui.common.UiHelper

  • public class UiHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains static methods to help building commonly used UI elements.

      • hideSoftKeyboard

        public static void hideSoftKeyboard(Activity activity)
        Helper function to hide the keyboard when clicking on an element.

        See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4165414/how-to-hide-soft-keyboard-on-android-after-clicking-outside-edittext

        Parameters:
        activity - The Activity where this operation is performed

      • setupHidableKeyboard

        public static void setupHidableKeyboard(View view,
                                        Activity activity)
        Setup the UI to be able to click outside of keyboard to hide it.

        We recursively parse the content of the View and register a touch listener that will hide the keyboard on all elements that are not EditTexts.

        See http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4165414/how-to-hide-soft-keyboard-on-android-after-clicking-outside-edittext

        also do append text to EditTexts such that the cursor for editing is at the end and not at the beginning.

        Parameters:
        view - The view to parse
        activity - The Activity where this operation is performed

      • getFileSize

        public static java.lang.String getFileSize(long size)
        Get a user-friendly data size
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the data to evaluate
        Returns:
        a String such as "2.2 GiB or 1.23 kiB

      • redirectTo

        public static void redirectTo(java.lang.Class targetActivityClass,
                              java.lang.String msg,
                              Activity activity)
        Close the current activity and redirect the user to another one.

        Note: if this function is called from outside of the UI thread, msg cannot be set, as it triggers the display of a toast.

        Parameters:
        targetActivityClass - Target Activity to redirect to.
        msg - A message to display as a toast.
        activity - The current activity
